name: Scam Impedance ministry
description:
These days, scammers, counterfeiters and pirates are trying to ship their goods all over the world, but when they seem over wheeling there is a hero, The Scam impedance ministry. this group funnels packages through its warehouses for many employees, Like you, To look through and catch the counterfeiters, Silence the scammers, and Pause the pirates.

Controls:
Left Click - Progress dialogue
